subject: Motorcycles, Motor Bikes and Motorscooters
lead_paragraph: Larry Dixon defeated Doug Herbert at the ProCare Rx NHRA SuperNationals at Englishtown, N.J., to win his 40th Top Fuel title, breaking a tie with Kenny Bernstein for second place on the career list.Tommy Johnson Jr. won the Funny Car event. Greg Anderson won the Pro Stock race, tying him with Don Prudhomme for sixth place with 49 victories, and Craig Treble won the Pro Stock Motorcycle event.Dixon beat Herbert out of the gates and inched away as he went down the track with a time of 4.625 seconds at 321.73 miles an hour to Herbert’s 4.675 at 316.30 m.p.h.
